title: Militants Attack Kabul Army Post
description: At least 11 Afghan soldiers have been killed and others wounded in an attack on an army base in the capital, Kabul. It's the third attack by militants in just over a week. Najibullah Azad, deputy spokesperson to President Ashraf Ghani, told Newshour that the …

author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Army dogs faced with being destroyed reprieved
description: The Ministry of Defence planned to destroy the dogs because it said they were too aggressive to rehome.

author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Rohingya crisis: Myanmar army admits killings
description: It is a rare admission from the security forces that they were involved in abuses in Rakhine state.

author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Nigerian army: Ian Squire kidnapper killed
description: A manhunt for the gang leader had been underway since he kidnapped four Britons last year.

author: BBC World Service
title: The Odyssey of General Anders' Army
description: By the summer of 1940, a quarter of a million Polish prisoners of war had already been sent to Soviet prison camps. More than a million civilians deemed undesirable by Stalin were packed aboard cattle trucks to the far east of the Soviet Union. Many died on t…

title: The 'changing face' of the British Army
description: A new photography exhibition shows the Army in a new light.

title: Israeli jet downed by Syrian fire - army
description: Israeli fighter jet shot down after operation against Iranian targets in Syria, pilots safe, Israeli military says

title: Zimbabwe Army: Mugabe to Meet Rival
description: Zimbabwe's top general says President Robert Mugabe is in contact with the former vice-president Emmerson Mnangagwa whose sacking prompted the current political crisis. The eldest daughter of Mr Mnangagwa tells Newshour her father, who has been described as M…

title: Israel targets Syrian military base - Syrian state TV
description: Syria says Israel attacked an army position outside Damascus and two missiles were destroyed.

title: How China's first emperor searched for elixir of life
description: New research shines light on the quest by Qin Shi Huang, who created the terracotta army.

title: Vietnam army hires censors to fight 'internet chaos'
description: Local media reports the People's Army has hired more than 10,000 people to tackle "wrongful views".

title: Syrian army deserters on why they had to escape the civil war
description: Seif and Ghadir both deserted the "slavery" of the Syrian Army and fled the country.

title: Why Pakistan won't share intelligence with the US
description: The foreign minister says the countries aren't allies anymore and the army chief "feels betrayed".

title: Syria war: US Kurdish 'border force' plan denounced
description: Turkey's president vows to "suffocate" efforts to train Kurdish fighters and create "a terror army".

title: What's happening to defence spending?
description: A warning from the head of the British army focuses attention on defence spending.

title: Army jobs: Are there fewer young white British men?
description: The head of the Army claims there are 25% fewer white men aged 16 to 25.

title: Newspaper headlines: 'Army lags behind Russia' and steroid alert

title: Football president George Weah puts Liberian army to the test
description: Ex-football pro George Weah challenges Liberia's army to a friendly before his inauguration.

title: 'Ice Maiden' team completes Antarctica ski record
description: The team of women, all part of the British Army, completed their challenge in two months.

title: Mindy Kaling: US army deletes Twitter like 'mocking Donald Trump'
description: An army Twitter curator "inadvertently" flagged up the offending tweet, a source is quoted as saying.
